name: Flower Me To The Moon
description:
Have you ever dreamed of planting seeds on the Moon?

In "Flower Me To The Moon", you control a gardener from the Moon trying to make their flower garden thrive by filling it with plants of all types of shapes and behaviors.

Your goal is to fill your moon garden while discovering as many different species of plants as you can, which you can collect in your own personal herbarium. Plants that come to touch merge to create new species... See how many you can discover!

Controls :

Space: Confirm (in menu) / Plant a seed

Up/down/left/right: Move cursor

Q and E: Change selected seed (A / E on French keyboards)

Esc: Pause
